meanings.definition: A poem, word puzzle, or other composition in which certain letters in each line form a word or words.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed creating an acrostic poem in class.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a beautiful acrostic for her best friend's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The acrostic puzzle in the newspaper was tricky but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: His acrostic of love spelled out 'forever' in each line.
meanings.sent5: The acrostic of nature painted a vivid picture of the changing seasons.

meanings.definition: A composition in which the first letter of each line spells out a word, message, or the alphabet.
meanings.sent1: During the talent show, she performed an acrostic that spelled 'DANCE'.
meanings.sent2: The acrostic on the poster revealed a secret message to the readers.
meanings.sent3: The acrostic of colors on the wall brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: His acrostic of success spelled out 'hard work' in a creative way.
meanings.sent5: The acrostic of friendship symbolized unity and support among friends.
